author: Hikari 93
title: Chronodragon Gear Groovy
text:
|set1 = G-CB04/003 (RRR) - G-CB04/S04 (SP)
G-CB04/003EN (RRR) - G-CB04/S02EN (SP) |set1 = G-CB04/003 (RRR) - G-CB04/S04 (SP)
G-CB04/003EN (RRR) - G-CB04/S02EN (SP) |flavor = The accrued thoughts, now become wings that head towards the future. |flavor = The accrued thoughts, now become wings that head towards the future. âˆ’ |effect = {{Stride|3}}
{{GB|2|ACT|V|Once|NoText}}:[{{GPersona}}] If you have a heart card with "[[Chronojet]]" in its card name, choose a [AUTO] ability of two face up <[[Gear Dragon]]> in your G zone, and this unit gets all of the chosen abilities until end of turn.
{{GB|3|ACT|V|Once|NoText}}:[Soul Blast (1) & {{GPersona|Any}}] This unit gets [Power]+5000 until end of turn. + |effect = {{Stride|3}}
{{GB|2|ACT|V|Once|NoText}}:[{{GPersona}}] If you have a heart card with "[[Chronojet]]" in its card name, choose an [AUTO] ability each from two face up <[[Gear Dragon]]> in your G zone, and this unit gets all of the chosen abilities until end of turn.
{{GB|3|ACT|V|Once|NoText}}:[Soul Blast (1) & {{GPersona|Any}}] This unit gets [Power]+5000 until end of turn.
